sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' const MarkersTab = () => { return (

Research and Development

  • Covid-19
  • NEUROSCIENCE INSPIRED AI
  • SANSKRIT TRANSLATION

In the fight against COVID-19, we did the molecular docking analysis in-silico, followed by In-vitro and resultant molecule was tested in a 3D printed vascular lung model with Reagene Biosciences and INDRAS as partners . There is also a range of innovative solutions help cope up with the social circumstances.

EXPLORE

The human brain is the grandest machine of all. In our quest to produce AI for the future, we are researching at the primal level of intelligence.

EXPLORE

Human beings evolved at a rapid pace because of the way they could communicate. One of the oldest well-formed languages is now being relegated to scriptures with 1645 dialects and 23 mother tongues. Our research is to make Sanskrit the translation layer for Indian languages.

EXPLORE
) } export default MarkersTab
